message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.CV 

This paper involves natural language processing (NLP) and robotics, which are both interdisciplinary fields that can fall under multiple arXiv categories. However, the focus on NLP and the use of cognitive semantics and construction grammar suggest that cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category. Additionally, the use of reasoning and evaluation in robot-robot interactions suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics) are also likely categories. The paper also involves visual perception, which could fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision), and the use of language models, which could fall under cs.LG (Learning).
